grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 涙液【ルイエキ】lacrimal fluid, tears
涙管【ルイカン】lachrymal or tear duct
催涙【サイルイ】lacrimator, dacryagogue, tear-inducing agent
感涙【カンルイ】tears (from being deeply moved), tears of gratitude
kun reading compounds: 涙【なみだ】tear, tears, lachrymal secretion, sympathy
涙ぐましい【なみだぐましい】touching, moving, painful
悔し涙【くやしなみだ】tears of regret, bitter tears, vexation, chagrin
忝涙【かたじけなみだ】tears of gratitude
